means: <贬>忧郁地闲荡( mope的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_cn: 自怨自艾一点用处都没有！

sentence.Network_en: You spend too much time moping around the house.
He's been moping about all day.
sentence.Network_cn: 他百无聊赖地转悠了一整天.

entry.tran: 感到沮丧;闷闷不乐;百无聊赖
entry.def: If you mope, you feel miserable and do not feel interested in doing anything.

example.ex: Get on with life and don't sit back and mope.
example.tran: 活跃一些享受生活，不要闲呆着闷闷不乐的。

auth_sentence.content: Here I sit moping all the live-long Night.
auth_sentence.res_content: Here I sit moping all the live-long Night.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Here I sit moping all the live-long Night.

auth_sentence.content: The town seemed full of almost useless men moping at street corners.
auth_sentence.res_content: The town seemed full of almost useless men moping at street corners.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The town seemed full of almost useless men moping at street corners.

auth_sentence.content: I learnt that sulking, crying, moping, and malingering were bluffs that paid.
auth_sentence.res_content: I learnt that sulking, crying, moping, and malingering were bluffs that paid.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I learnt that sulking, crying, moping, and malingering were bluffs that paid.
